parameter.name: radious_group_name
parameter.description: Radius Group Name[Enter Only if you want to configure for radius group]

parameter.name: servername_ip1
parameter.description: Server name or IP Address for Radius Group/Host

parameter.name: servername_ip2
parameter.description: Server name or IP Address for Radius Group Only

parameter.name: servername_ip3
parameter.description: Server name or IP Address for Radius Group Only

parameter.name: servername_ip4
parameter.description: Server name or IP Address for Radius Group Only

parameter.name: servername_ip5
parameter.description: Server name or IP Address for Radius Group Only

cli.name: cli command set
cli.clicommand:
#if( ($family_value =="Cisco Catalyst 36xx stack-able ethernet switch" || $family_value=="Cisco Catalyst 3650 Series Switches" || $family_value=="Cisco Catalyst 3850 Series Ethernet Stackable Switch" || $family_value=="Cisco Catalyst38xx stack-able ethernet switch" || $family_value=="Cisco Catalyst 9300 Series Switches") && ($sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1641" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1642" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1643" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1644" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1879" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1880" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1767" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1768" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1745" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.2165" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.2166" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1823" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1824" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1825" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1826" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1827" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1828" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1829" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1830" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1831" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1881" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1882" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.2066" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.1745" || $sys_oid=="1.3.6.1.4.1.9.1.2494")) #set($dotIndex=$imageVersion.indexOf(".")) #set($osVersion=0) #set($versionCheck="false") #if($dotIndex != -1) #set ( $osVersion = $osVersion.parseInt($imageVersion.substring(0,$dotIndex))) #end #if($osVersion >= 16 || $osVersion == 3) #set($versionCheck="true") #end #if($versionCheck=="true") #if(${radious_group_name} == "") aaa new-model aaa session-id common
aaa server radius dynamic-author client ${servername_ip1} server-key ${shared_key} auth-type any exit radius-server attribute 6 on-for-login-auth radius-server attribute 8 include-in-access-req radius-server attribute 25 access-request include radius-server attribute 31 send nas-port-detail radius-server dead-criteria time 10 tries 5 #if(${MAB_AAA} eq "Enable") aaa authentication dot1x default group radius aaa authorization network default group radius aaa authorization configuration default group radius aaa accounting dot1x default start-stop group radius #end #if(${AAAforWebAuthentication} eq "Enable") aaa authentication login default group radius aaa authorization auth-proxy default group radius aaa accounting auth-proxy default start-stop group radius #end radius-server vsa send accounting radius-server vsa send authentication
#else aaa new-model aaa session-id common
aaa server radius dynamic-author client ${servername_ip1} server-key ${shared_key} auth-type any exit
radius server ${radious_group_name} #if(${servername_ip1} != "" and ${authentication_port1} !="" and ${accounting_port1} != "") address ipv4 ${servername_ip1} auth-port ${authentication_port1} acct-port ${accounting_port1} pac key ${shared_key}
#end #if(${servername_ip2} != "" and ${authentication_port2} !="" and ${accounting_port2} != "") address ipv4 ${servername_ip2} auth-port ${authentication_port2} acct-port ${accounting_port2} pac key ${shared_key} #end #if(${servername_ip3} != "" and ${authentication_port3} !="" and ${accounting_port3} != "") address ipv4 ${servername_ip3} auth-port ${authentication_port3} acct-port ${accounting_port3} pac key ${shared_key} #end #if(${servername_ip4} != "" and ${authentication_port4} !="" and ${accounting_port4} != "") address ipv4 ${servername_ip4} auth-port ${authentication_port4} acct-port ${accounting_port4} pac key ${shared_key} #end #if(${servername_ip5} != "" and ${authentication_port5} !="" and ${accounting_port5} != "") address ipv4 ${servername_ip5} auth-port ${authentication_port5} acct-port ${accounting_port5} pac key ${shared_key} #end exit aaa group server radius ${radious_group_name} server name ${radious_group_name} #if(${servername_ip1} != "" and ${authentication_port1} !="" and ${accounting_port1} != "") server ${servername_ip1} auth-port ${authentication_port1} acct-port ${accounting_port1} #end #if(${servername_ip2} != "" and ${authentication_port2} !="" and ${accounting_port2} != "") server ${servername_ip2} auth-port ${authentication_port2} acct-port ${accounting_port2} #end #if(${servername_ip3} != "" and ${authentication_port3} !="" and ${accounting_port3} != "") server ${servername_ip3} auth-port ${authentication_port3} acct-port ${accounting_port3} #end #if(${servername_ip4} != "" and ${authentication_port4} !="" and ${accounting_port4} != "") server ${servername_ip4} auth-port ${authentication_port4} acct-port ${accounting_port4} #end #if(${servername_ip5} != "" and ${authentication_port5} !="" and ${accounting_port5} != "") server ${servername_ip5} auth-port ${authentication_port5} acct-port ${accounting_port5} #end exit #if(${MAB_AAA} eq "Enable") aaa authentication dot1x default group ${radious_group_name} aaa authorization network default group ${radious_group_name} aaa authorization configuration default group ${radious_group_name} aaa accounting dot1x default start-stop group ${radious_group_name} #end #if(${AAAforWebAuthentication} eq "Enable") aaa authentication login default group ${radious_group_name} aaa authorization auth-proxy default group ${radious_group_name} aaa accounting auth-proxy default start-stop group ${radious_group_name} #end radius-server vsa send accounting radius-server vsa send authentication
radius-server attribute 6 on-for-login-auth radius-server attribute 8 include-in-access-req radius-server attribute 25 access-request include radius-server attribute 31 send nas-port-detail radius-server dead-criteria time 10 tries 5 #end #end #else #if(${radious_group_name} == "") aaa new-model radius-server host ${servername_ip1} auth-port ${authentication_port1} acct-port ${accounting_port1} key ${shared_key} #if(${MAB_AAA} eq "Enable") aaa authentication dot1x default group radius aaa authorization network default group radius aaa authorization configuration default group radius aaa accounting dot1x default start-stop group radius #end #if(${AAAforWebAuthentication} eq "Enable") aaa authentication login default group radius aaa authorization auth-proxy default group radius aaa accounting auth-proxy default start-stop group radius #end radius-server vsa send accounting radius-server vsa send authentication #else aaa new-model radius-server key ${shared_key} #if(${servername_ip1} != "" and ${authentication_port1} !="" and ${accounting_port1} != "") radius-server host ${servername_ip1} auth-port ${authentication_port1} acct-port ${accounting_port1} #end #if(${servername_ip2} != "" and ${authentication_port2} !="" and ${accounting_port2} != "") radius-server host ${servername_ip2} auth-port ${authentication_port2} acct-port ${accounting_port2} #end #if(${servername_ip3} != "" and ${authentication_port3} !="" and ${accounting_port3} != "") radius-server host ${servername_ip3} auth-port ${authentication_port3} acct-port ${accounting_port3} #end #if(${servername_ip4} != "" and ${authentication_port4} !="" and ${accounting_port4} != "") radius-server host ${servername_ip4} auth-port ${authentication_port4} acct-port ${accounting_port4} #end #if(${servername_ip5} != "" and ${authentication_port5} !="" and ${accounting_port5} != "") radius-server host ${servername_ip5} auth-port ${authentication_port5} acct-port ${accounting_port5} #end aaa group server radius ${radious_group_name} #if(${servername_ip1} != "" and ${authentication_port1} !="" and ${accounting_port1} != "") server ${servername_ip1} auth-port ${authentication_port1} acct-port ${accounting_port1} #end #if(${servername_ip2} != "" and ${authentication_port2} !="" and ${accounting_port2} != "") server ${servername_ip2} auth-port ${authentication_port2} acct-port ${accounting_port2} #end #if(${servername_ip3} != "" and ${authentication_port3} !="" and ${accounting_port3} != "") server ${servername_ip3} auth-port ${authentication_port3} acct-port ${accounting_port3} #end #if(${servername_ip4} != "" and ${authentication_port4} !="" and ${accounting_port4} != "") server ${servername_ip4} auth-port ${authentication_port4} acct-port ${accounting_port4} #end #if(${servername_ip5} != "" and ${authentication_port5} !="" and ${accounting_port5} != "") server ${servername_ip5} auth-port ${authentication_port5} acct-port ${accounting_port5} #end #if(${MAB_AAA} eq "Enable") aaa authentication dot1x default group ${radious_group_name} aaa authorization network default group ${radious_group_name} aaa authorization configuration default group ${radious_group_name} aaa accounting dot1x default start-stop group ${radious_group_name} #end #if(${AAAforWebAuthentication} eq "Enable") aaa authentication login default group ${radious_group_name} aaa authorization auth-proxy default group ${radious_group_name} aaa accounting auth-proxy default start-stop group ${radious_group_name} #end radius-server vsa send accounting radius-server vsa send authentication #end #end
